types.name: 500 Gram Repeaters
types.description: Ultimate in pyro-aerial action. One fuse ignites long barrages of spectacular timed bursts with vivid colors and professional show style effects.

types.name: 200 Gram Repeaters
types.description: Each multi-shot repeater is it's own aerial extravaganza with beautiful color bursts and effects that can be accompanied with whistles, crackles or loud reports.

types.name: Reloadable Mortars
types.description: Self-containing kits that include launching tubes and a variety of high trajectory bursting aerial shells that you load individually. Effects are designed in the same style as the larger professional versions.

types.name: Finale Racks
types.description: These large bore shells and racks are the closest performance to true professional display fireworks on the market. Tremendous trajectory and burst scope with the most advanced effects in the industry.

types.name: Tubes
types.description: Single Tubes with Tremendous trajectory and burst scope with the most advanced effects in the industry.

types.name: Rockets & Missiles
types.description: Pyrotechnic fireworks made out of a paper tube packed with gunpowder that is propelled into the air.

types.name: Roman Candles
types.description: A Roman candle is a traditional type of firework that ejects one or more stars or exploding shells and come in a variety of sizes.

types.name: Aerial Spinners
types.description: These helicopter style items need to be lit on a hard flat surface and fly into the air with colorful showers of sparks or crackling effect.

types.name: Parachutes
types.description: Upon bursting in the air, releases a single or multiple parachutes loved by young children.

types.name: Fountains
types.description: Stationary  fireworks that produce a magical fireworks show of color,crackle,whistles and glitter from the ground up to 12 feet.

types.name: Ground Spinners
types.description: Spinners make an illuminating impression and keep the firework fun going around and around and do not fly up in the air.

types.name: Jumping Jacks
types.description: A classic pyrotechnic device that looks like a firecracker, but actually produces wildly spinning assorted color ground effects that go in all directions.

types.name: Firecrackers
types.description: We offer the loudest firecrackers allowed by federal law - Wolf PackÂ®. All of our firecrackers meet the specifications for manufacture and performance of the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission.

types.name: Smoke
types.description: Amazing, vibrant colored smoke produced once lit.

types.name: Wheels
types.description: Disc shaped fireworks with various spinning and twirling colorful effects.
